column2: Joe Biden Wields Baseball Bat In ‘Photoshop Battle’ That’s A Home Run
column5: Reddit users knocked it out of the park with their latest “Photoshop battle.” They comically reworked this picture of President Joe Biden wielding a baseball bat in front of Senate Minority Leader Mitch McConnell (R-Ky.). President-elect Joe Biden will be sworn in as the 46th president of the U.S. on Jan. 20. On Feb. 11 2011 then-VP Biden spoke at UofL as part of the @ULmCenter Distinguished Speaker Series. “We are not passengers of history but we are drivers of history" he said. #TBT pic.twitter.com/wrQAVcjuTw The photo was taken in 2011 when Biden then vice president in Barack Obama’s administration visited the McConnell Center at the University of Louisville in Kentucky. It’s unclear why the image resurfaced this week but Reddit users immediately set to work by dropping Biden into movies and other amusing scenarios:
